meanings.definition: A type of fern found in Australia.
meanings.sent1: The nardoo plant grows in the wild forests.
meanings.sent2: The nardoo fern is a common sight in Australian woodlands.
meanings.sent3: I saw a kangaroo hopping near a patch of nardoo!
meanings.sent4: The nardoo ferns swayed gently in the breeze like dancers.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the nardoo leaves stood out against the brown earth.

meanings.definition: The edible starchy flour made from the dried stems of the nardoo fern.
meanings.sent1: The indigenous people used nardoo to make nutritious flour.
meanings.sent2: Nardoo flour is a staple food for many communities.
meanings.sent3: I baked delicious bread using nardoo as the main ingredient!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked nardoo bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The nardoo flour added a unique flavor to the dish.

meanings.sent1: We will nardoo the ferns for our meal tonight.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys nardooing in the early morning.
meanings.sent3: Let's nardoo some nardoo and have a feast!
meanings.sent4: The villagers nardooed together to prepare for the winter.
